description: A debugging pipeline that outputs all family history and clinical entity mentions.

config._desc: Runs NLP. In this case, we use pasc ruleset that is bundled by default as an example
config._desc_ctd: Note: you will need to install the MedTagger Backbone Component found at https://www.github.com/OHNLP/MedTagger

config._desc: Writes MedTagger output to file as a CSV
config._desc_ctd: Not guaranteed to function on all platforms
